wikipedia_page.main: Duncan P B Bridge (born 1958) is a retired male badminton player from England.

link_mentions.page: List of medalists at the European Junior Badminton Championships

response: Four years later, as Karen Beckman she represented England and won a gold medal in the team event and two silver medals in the women's doubles and mixed doubles, at the 1982 Commonwealth Games in Brisbane, Queensland, Australia. The mixed doubles medal was with her brother, Duncan Bridge.
